name: Alchemical Familiar
summary: You have used alchemy to create life, a simple creature formed from alchemical materials, reagents, and a bit of your own blood.

name: Alchemical Savant
summary: You can identify alchemical items quickly.

name: Far Lobber
summary: You’ve learned how to throw a longer distance.

name: Quick Bomber
summary: You keep your bombs in easy-to-reach pouches from which you draw without thinking.

name: Subtle Delivery
summary: You can capably deliver toxins with a blowgun.

name: Demolition Charge
summary: You can rig your bombs to inanimate objects in order to cause destruction to the surrounding area.

name: Revivifying Mutagen
summary: While under the effect of a mutagen, you can metabolize that mutagen’s power to heal yourself.

name: Smoke Bomb
summary: You cause the bomb to create a cloud of thick smoke, in addition to its normal effects.

name: Calculated Splash
summary: You have calculated all the angles to maximize a bomb’s splash.

name: Chemical Purification
summary: You developed a method to chemically purify and consecrate your bombs on the fly.

name: Efficient Alchemy (Alchemist)
summary: Thanks to the time you’ve spent studying and experimenting, you know how to scale your formulas into larger batches that don’t require any additional attention.

name: Enduring Alchemy
summary: You’ve learned how to make your personal energy last just a little bit longer when quickly brewing ad hoc concoctions.

name: Healing Bomb
summary: By adding a special catalyst, you transform a healing elixir into a topical projectile.

name: Inured to Alchemy
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 79</row>
summary: You've developed control over how your body processes alchemical poisons and drugs.

name: Tenacious Toxins
summary: Your victims tend to expire long before your poisons, since the latter have been specifically formulated to last longer.

name: Artokus's Fire
summary: Artokus developed a mixture of volatile materials that burns hotter and longer than typical alchemist's fire.

name: Combine Elixirs
summary: You’ve discovered how to mix two elixirs into a single hybrid concoction.

name: Debilitating Bomb
summary: Your bombs impose additional effects on your enemies.

name: Directional Bombs
summary: You can lob bombs with great force and a precise trajectory to angle the splash in a cone spraying in a single direction.

name: Sticky Poison
summary: A combination of additional viscosity and careful application keeps your weapons poisoned even when suffering significant wear and tear.

name: Feral Mutagen
summary: Your bestial mutagen brings out the beast lurking within you.

name: Perpetual Breadth
summary: You have expanded your supply of near-infinite items.

name: Pinpoint Poisoner
summary: Unsuspecting targets are especially vulnerable to your poisons.

name: Retaliatory Cleansing
summary: You twist your hand in front of the blow, ensuring the enemy's attack shatters the required _holy water_ or bomb.

name: Sticky Bomb
summary: You mix in an additive to make your bomb’s contents adhere to the target and continue to deal damage.

name: Elastic Mutagen
summary: You can cause your body to twist and flow like the quicksilver within your mutagens.

name: Expanded Splash
summary: The particularly volatile compounds that you brew into your bombs result in them creating especially large and powerful explosions.

name: Greater Debilitating Bomb
summary: You have learned enhanced techniques and alchemical secrets that allow you to expand the range of effects you can impose with your bombs.

name: Merciful Elixir
summary: You mix a special additive into your elixir that calms the drinker’s body and mind.

name: Potent Poisoner
summary: By concentrating your poisons’ toxic components, you make them harder for victims to resist.

name: Unstable Concoction
summary: You can create extraordinary—albeit volatile—alchemical wonders, though they have an unfortunate tendency to violently explode when you use them.

name: Extend Elixir
summary: Integrating your own personal energy into the elixirs you create causes them to affect you for longer.

name: Invincible Mutagen
summary: The fortifying additives you brew into your mutagens make your juggernaut form impervious.

name: Shaped Contaminant
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad pg. 78</row>
summary: Through a combination of careful manipulation and precise breath control, you can deploy inhaled toxins precisely.

name: Uncanny Bombs
summary: You lob bombs unerringly, despite obstructions or distance.

name: Glib Mutagen
summary: Your silvertongue mutagen transcends languages and plausibility.

name: Greater Merciful Elixir
summary: Your additives contain panaceas that can remedy a plethora of maladies.

name: True Debilitating Bomb
summary: Ever inventive, you have discovered increasingly devastating ways for your bombs to impede and hamper your foes.

name: Chemical Contagion
summary: With carefully engineered enzymes, you coax some of your poison to infect another target, using the original victim as a carrier.

name: Eternal Elixir
summary: Your body readily accepts and retains minor changes.

name: Exploitive Bomb
summary: You mix a substance into the bomb to foil resistances.

name: Genius Mutagen
summary: Specialized tweaks to your formula that supplements your genius considerably broaden the benefits you gain from cognitive mutagens.

name: Persistent Mutagen
summary: You’ve trained your physical form to remain stable within the a given altered state.

name: Improbable Elixirs
summary: Your mastery of alchemical secrets enables you to replicate effects most believe can be achieved only via magic.

name: Mindblank Mutagen
summary: With a minor adjustment of ratios in the formula for your serene mutagen, you gain mental protections.

name: Miracle Worker
summary: Your alchemical mastery can resuscitate the recently slain.

name: Perfect Debilitation
summary: You have perfected the formulas for bombs that impede your enemies.

name: Astonishing Explosion
summary: Your bomb incorporates an explosive spark of wonder that leaves witnesses dumbfounded.

name: Craft Philosopher's Stone
summary: Your research has paid off, culminating in the legendary philosopher’s stone.

name: Efficient Alchemy (Paragon)
summary: Prepare more alchemical items from your infused reagents.

name: Mega Bomb
summary: You add an incredibly powerful additive to a held bomb to create a mega bomb.

name: Perfect Mutagen
summary: You have enhanced the formulas for your mutagens, aligning them perfectly to your physiology.

name: Plum Deluge
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 76</row>
summary: You have learned to saturate an area with poison.

name: Wish Alchemy
summary: You have learned Artokus Kirran's most hidden secrets, granting you the ability to create alchemy infused with the power of wishes.
